verses.t: And{G2532} when{G3753} he had opened{G455} the seventh{G1442} seal{G3588}, there was{G1096} silence{G4602} in{G1722} heaven{G3588} about{G5613} the space of half an hour{G2256}.
And{G2532} I saw{G1492} the seven{G2033} angels{G32} which{G3739} stood{G2476} before{G1799} God{G3588}; and{G2532} to them{G846} were given{G1325} seven{G2033} trumpets{G4536}.

And{G2532} another{G243} angel{G32} came{G2064} and{G2532} stood{G2476} at{G1909} the altar{G3588}, having{G2192} a golden{G5552} censer{G3031}; and{G2532} there was given{G1325} unto him{G846} much{G4183} incense{G2368}, that{G2443} he should offer{G1325} it with the prayers{G3588} of all{G3956} saints{G40} upon{G1909} the golden{G5552} altar{G3588} which was{G3588} before{G1799} the throne{G3588}.
And{G2532} the smoke{G3588} of the incense{G3588}, which came with the prayers{G3588} of the saints{G40}, ascended up{G305} before{G1799} God{G3588} out{G1537} of the angel's{G3588} hand{G5495}.

And{G2532} the angel{G3588} took{G2983} the censer{G3031}, and{G2532} filled{G1072} it{G846} with fire{G3588} of{G1537} the altar{G3588}, and{G2532} cast{G906} it into{G1519} the earth{G3588}: and{G2532} there were{G1096} voices{G5456}, and{G2532} thunderings{G1027}, and{G2532} lightnings{G796}, and{G2532} an earthquake{G4578}.
And{G2532} the seven{G2033} angels{G32} which had{G2192} the seven{G2033} trumpets{G4536} prepared{G2090} themselves{G1438} to{G2443} sound{G4537}.

The{G2532} first{G4413} angel{G32} sounded{G4537}, and{G2532} there followed{G1096} hail{G5464} and{G2532} fire{G4442} mingled{G3396} with blood{G129}, and{G2532} they were cast{G906} upon{G1519} the earth{G3588}: and{G2532} the third part{G5154} of trees{G3588} was burnt up{G2618}, and{G2532} all{G3956} green{G5515} grass{G5528} was burnt up{G2618}.

And{G2532} the second{G1208} angel{G32} sounded{G4537}, and{G2532} as it were{G5613} a great{G3173} mountain{G3735} burning{G2545} with fire{G4442} was cast{G906} into{G1519} the sea{G3588}: and{G2532} the third part{G5154} of the sea{G3588} became{G1096} blood{G129};

And{G2532} the third part{G5154} of the creatures{G3588} which were{G3588} in{G1722} the sea{G3588}, and had{G2192} life{G5590}, died{G599}; and{G2532} the third part{G5154} of the ships{G3588} were destroyed{G1311}.

And{G2532} the third{G5154} angel{G32} sounded{G4537}, and{G2532} there fell{G4098} a great{G3173} star{G792} from{G1537} heaven{G3588}, burning{G2545} as it were{G5613} a lamp{G2985}, and{G2532} it fell{G4098} upon{G1909} the third part{G5154} of the rivers{G3588}, and{G2532} upon{G1909} the fountains{G3588} of waters{G5204};

And{G2532} the name{G3588} of the star{G3588} is called{G3004} Wormwood{G894}: and{G2532} the third{G5154} part of the waters{G894} became{G1096} wormwood{G4183}; and{G444} many{G599} men{G1537} died{G3588} of{G5204} the waters, because{G3754} they were made bitter{G4087}.

And{G2532} the fourth{G5067} angel{G32} sounded{G4537}, and{G2532} the third part{G5154} of the sun{G3588} was smitten{G4141}, and{G2532} the third part{G5154} of the moon{G3588}, and{G2532} the third part{G5154} of the stars{G3588}; so as{G2443} the third part{G5154} of them{G846} was darkened{G4654}, and{G2532} the day{G3588} shone{G5316} not{G3361} for a third part{G5154} of it{G846}, and{G2532} the night{G3588} likewise{G3668}.

And{G2532} I beheld{G1492}, and{G2532} heard{G191} an{G1520} angel{G32} flying{G4072} through the midst of heaven{G3321}, saying{G3004}with{G1722} a loud{G3173} voice{G5456}, Woe{G3759}, woe{G3759}, woe{G3759}, to the{G3588} inhabiters{G2730} of{G1909} the earth{G3588} by reason{G1537} of the other{G3062} voices{G5456} of the trumpet{G3588} of the three{G5140} angels{G32}, which are yet{G3195} to sound{G4537}!
